text: I ty, poistine, uvidish', Chto ikh zhadnost' k zhizni Sil'neye, chem u vsekh lyudey, I dazhe (bol'she), chem u tekh, Kto prochit souchastnikov (Allakhu). I vsyak iz nikh zhelayet, Chtob zhizn' v tysyachu godov yemu byla dana, No dazhe dar stol' dolgoy zhizni Yego ot kary ne izbavit, - Allakh ved' vidit, chto tvoryat oni
